parameters:
\SE[46]Please listen... Father. \SE[47]It seems that starting
next year, I will be given a black uniform. \SE[32]I am still in
the middle of the proof, but... for now, I have been recognized.

\SE[51] Oh my, my lord... Looks like you're shedding some tears
there... \SE[35] Well well, it's the duty of a servant to provide
good support, isn't it?

\SE[2]Oh, young lady. \SE[45]Your hem is a little crooked.
\SE[45]...If you leave it like this, it will wrinkle. \SE[45]Let
me fix it for you.
\SE[57]Please don't move... I'll fix it quickly.

Life has its ups and downs... Sometimes things go well, sometimes
they don't... We are just being carried away...
Hope appears, then shows a shadow.
